body_html: Using code from 0.12 master branch fixed it for me. I think it is something to do with replacing. tf.strided_slice with tf.slice. Edit: Use code from here - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.12/tensorflow/models/rnn/ptb/
body_text:
Using code from 0.12 master branch fixed it for me.

I think it is something to do with replacing. tf.strided_slice with
tf.slice.

Edit: Use code from here - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.12/tensorflow/models/rnn/ptb/
body:
Using code from 0.12 master branch fixed it for me.

I think it is something to do with replacing. tf.strided_slice with
tf.slice.

Edit: Use code from here - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.12/tensorflow/models/rnn/ptb/
